title: Montana State Men's Hoops Faces Texas Tech in NCAA Tournament Friday - Bobcats Athletics
content: Montana State Men's Hoops Faces Texas Tech in NCAA Tournament Friday  Bobcats Athletics
description: Montana State makes its first appearance in the NCAA Tournament in 26 years on Friday at 11:45 a.m. MDT when the Bobcats, the No. 14 seed in the West Region, take on No. 3 seed Texas Tech in San Diego at Viejas Arena
